channel.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
channel.description:
(please note, i will not releace this)
Hello, I spent a few hours working on this mech suit for a mates UDK project. At the moment i am making some interchangeable weapons and different body kits.
Theres a walking animation for yah :D
(note, it is my first go at animating, but i think its pretty good) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ih2u-G5rPiw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ih2u-G5rPiw[/url]
Pic's
[IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/renderfog.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/render3textured.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/Render1textured.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1200.photobucket.com/albums/bb330/shrogg/Wire.jpg[/img]
If anyone wants me to make a weapon or has a interesting idea for one, then tell me.
Weapons i am currently building:
Large gun Chain gun Dual/single shoulder mounted Missile launcher Power Sword Nuke launcher

well, well for my first shot at animating a biped i think it was pretty good, i think now i should try anitmate it to start walking then stop, and give the body enercia and stuff like that

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

shrogg:

thanks, i made it so its really easy to animate, and theres lots of different things you can change, like i added a “gun recoil” moidifyer onto all of the guns that i have made (all except the flamethrower) so you can animate the recoil of the guns with ease.

The walking looks a bit odd. I can’t quite put my finger on it. I think maybe the legs should have more of a “weighted” effect, where they go a bit slow, but not in an even pattern with no speed change.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

the wanderer:

I kind of had that idea too that it would probably be easier to get in perspective if you could pan around it. question is this like a monster or the main character in the game or whatever?

i actually dont know that, but I’m rigging it up so it can be easily animated and exported. i think it will be the main character, as that’s why I’m making different guns and such

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:22, topic:379924”]the renders arent the greatest,
but everything is quite clear when i am editing it
atm im currently having a few problems building the bone structure, but i have the legs working smoothly, and the head rotates…
now all i need to do is create a pivot point in the mail joint(hinge?) where everything comes together :D[/quote]
I kind of had that idea too that it would probably be easier to get in perspective if you could pan around it. question is this like a monster or the main character in the game or whatever?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

the renders arent the greatest,
but everything is quite clear when i am editing it
atm im currently having a few problems building the bone structure, but i have the legs working smoothly, and the head rotates…
now all i need to do is create a pivot point in the mail joint(hinge?) where everything comes together

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:16, topic:379924”]Could you guys please get back ontopic?
and WOOT rigged it :)))))
im in the processes of giving it more movible parts so i can practice my rigging abit more :D[/quote]
Remember triangles = good for animation. probably won’t necessarily need to though since this is a robot and will have pivot points and such. If you could, I would try and make it more easily defined as to what each part is. Because right now you can tell it’s a robot, but it’s hard to be like ah there’s the body, the legs and such. Might also be cuz I’m on my iPod.

Read full topic

Ix Soulcist xI:

That looks nice alright, bet this could be the next models for Star Wars if there is another.

What do you mean?

and also, textures are allmost finished, i just need to add detail like scratches and lights
[/quote]
Stating that this could replace the stupid things they’ve made for the other things like AT-AT or something in Star Wars.

item.title: [WIP] Mech robot [video]
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

without guns it has around 1332 polys, and 2764 tri’s.
with guns it can have (upwards of) 3-6k (6k is with all weapons attatched (including the rocked launcher with rockets)
AND
i have fully textured it (finally :D)
uploading some renders soon

Read full topic
